cs.man.ac.uk.classifier

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.man.ac.uk.classifier.Classifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GHVFDT

    public abstract class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class describing the methods that a generic classifier should possess.
    Author:
    Rob Lyon

      • trainOnInstance

        public abstract void trainOnInstance(I_Instance inst)
        Trains this classifier incrementally using the given instance.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be used for training.

      • predict

        public abstract double[] predict(I_Instance inst)
        Predicts the class label for an instance.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be classified.
        Returns:
        an array containing the estimated membership probabilities of the test instance in each class.

      • classify

        public abstract int classify(I_Instance inst)
        Predicts the class label for an instance.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be classified.
        Returns:
        an integer value representing the predicted class label.

      • correctlyClassifies

        public abstract boolean correctlyClassifies(I_Instance inst)
        Checks whether an instance is correctly classified.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be classified.
        Returns:
        true if the instance is correctly classified.

      • maxIndex

        public int maxIndex(double[] doubles)
        Returns index of maximum element in a given array of doubles. First maximum is returned.
        Parameters:
        doubles - the array of doubles
        Returns:
        the index of the maximum element
